name: Human (Articuano)
description:
This game is first and foremost made as a submission for the GDL jam.

I had a dream when I was 12 years old where I had been killed by a manifestation of my "bad side". A couple years later,I had the same dream but this time I'd matured  a bit and I was able to defeat this manifestation of myself.

I decided to take this concept and make a short game based on it. Now,while many events were made up because dreams make no sense and I had to give the world at least a little bit of authenticity.

I have tried my best to convey my emotions through this game and I hope those emotions go across without much hassle.

With that I'd like to conclude this description.

Oh,also follow me on twitter : https://twitter.com/Articuano19

And if you'd like to reach out to me personally you can contact me on discord @I'M BATMAN#3236.

Thank you for playing this game!
